636270.name: The Loop
636270.description:
The Loop - escape room game, psychological thriller in which the boundaries between realities are blurred so much that they begin to overlap one another. Office worker, religious fanatic or private detective? Who are you really?


Features:
- Cold story, in which you will take on the role of 3 different people and learn their story.
- The game is full of mysteries, the solution of which will help you to learn the history of each character.
- Three stories closely related to each other through the fabric of space and time.
- Playing with reality - every turn of the camera and you'll never guess what's waiting for you around the corner!
- Exploring various locations, you will have only one question - " How are they so similar?"
- Dark and deep music create and support a game-induced suspense
636270.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 韩语, 俄语*, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 波兰语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
